#Problem 1: Instacart

Load the data for Instacart and Exploration of Aisles
```{r}
data("instacart")

number_aisles = 
  instacart %>% 
  count(aisle) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n)) %>% 
  view()
```

In the `instacart` dataset, there are 1,384,617 observations and 15 variables. 
There are 134 unique aisles. The tope 3 aisles most ordered from are: "fresh vegetables", "fresh fruits", and "packaged vegetables fruits".

Aisle Plot
```{r}
number_ordered = number_aisles %>% 
  filter(n > 10000 ) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(
    x = number_aisles, 
    y = n,
    fill = name)) + 
  geom_density(alpha = .4, adjust = .5, color = "blue")
  
```
